amendment.description: Amendment reduces the funding for the EPA's greenhouse gas registry program by $6,246,000 and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 39 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the Environmental Programs and Management account by $6,246,000 and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A034) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 191 (Roll no. 661).
